nodes.text: An engineering corps was affiliated with the crime lord Nem'ro the Hutt during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. During a gang war between Nem'ro's gang and the rival Fa'athra gang, the engineering corps worked many days to find a way to sabotage Fa'athra's factories.
Nem'ro's engineering corps was first mentioned in the 2011 BioWare massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
